Help:Node.title: Command Usage: study
Help:Node.Log:Description:
COMMAND USAGE: @study ; @study [skill] with [teacher]
EXAMPLE: @study ; @study eastern with launfal
Allows you to study a skill. The designated teacher must know how to teach, must be better at you in the skill, and must want to teach you. You will have to study for an hour to have an opportunity to learn a skill. Type "@study" while studying to see your current status.
SEE ALSO: @assess, @teach
